70010000000023.description:
Step into a world of adventure

Forget everything you know about The Legend of Zelda games. Step into a world of discovery, exploration and adventure in The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild, a boundary-breaking new game in the acclaimed series. Travel across fields, through forests and to mountain peaks as you discover what has become of the ruined kingdom of Hyrule in this stunning open-air adventure.

Visit amiibo.nintendo.eu for compatible amiibo™ and the latest information.
70010000000023.intro:
No kingdom. No memories.
After a 100-year slumber, all he had left...was hope.
70010000000023.name: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild

70010000004515.description: Enjoy traditional Pokémon battles using familiar mechanics such as Pokémon Types, abilities, and moves, enabling rich and varied battle strategies that Trainers know and love.
70010000004515.intro: Pokémon Champions is coming to Nintendo Switch!
70010000004515.name: Pokémon Champions

70010000027620.description:
If the hustle and bustle of modern life’s got you down, Tom Nook has a business venture up his sleeve that he knows you’ll adore: his brand-new, ultra-exclusive Nook Inc. Deserted Island Getaway Package! 

•	Customise your character and home, and decorate the landscape (with furniture, if you like!), as you create your very own island paradise.

•	Experience a robust new crafting system – collect materials to construct everything from furniture to tools!

•	Enjoy a variety of relaxing activities like gardening, fishing, decorating, interacting with charming NPCs, and more, as classic Animal Crossing experiences come to life in fun new ways within the deserted-island setting.

•	Up to eight players can reside on an island; four residents of the same island can play together simultaneously on a single system.

•	Eight players can play together on one player’s island via online multiplayer or local wireless.
70010000027620.name: Animal Crossing: New Horizons

70010000032446.description:
Pokémon Café Mix just got a makeover and is ready to re-open! Now it's bustling with Pokémon!
The cute vibe is just the same, but we've really powered up the thrills and fun that you'll get from catching and training Pokémon and completing puzzles!

You’re the owner of a café that Pokémon visit.
With your Pokémon staff, complete puzzles to prepare drinks and dishes, and treat your Pokémon customers to a wonderful time at the café!

■Make your Pokémon into café staff!
All the café's clientele are Pokémon!
If you make friends with Pokémon by presenting them with yummy dishes, they'll join your staff. Then you'll be able to develop brand-new dishes with your Pokémon chums! And when they get wind of your delicious new dishes, even more new Pokémon will flock to your establishment to check them out!
Recruit lots of Pokémon to your café crew and make your café a fun place to be.

■Solve cooking puzzles with your Pokémon helpers!
Each of your Pokémon assistants will have their own special skills to bring to bear on the cooking puzzles. With new specialty gimmicks, the thrills you get from the puzzles will get a whole new boost!
Train up your Pokémon staff and aim for a three-star establishment!
70010000032446.intro:
Blend, link, and clear!
Enjoy fun culinary puzzles with Pokémon!
70010000032446.name: Pokémon Café ReMix

70010000043293.description:
Join Trainers from around the world as they head for Aeos Island to compete in Unite Battles! In Unite Battles, Trainers face off in 5-on-5 team battles to see who can score the most points within the allotted time. Teamwork is key as you and your teammates defeat wild Pokémon, level up and evolve your partner Pokémon, and knock out the opposing team’s Pokémon to prevent them from scoring points. Put your teamwork to the test, and take home the win! 

Key Features:
•BATTLE IN STYLE: Take to the field while looking your best in Holowear! Thanks to a special technology developed using Aeos energy, Trainers can deck out their Pokémon in a variety of holographic outfits—with new styles arriving regularly!

•UNITE MOVES: Unleash the true power of your Pokémon with Unite Moves! Leverage these all-new Pokémon moves, which are only possible while in Unite Battles, and turn the tide of even the direst situations.

•RANK UP: Looking to prove how skilled you are? Participate in ranked matches, and earn points as you climb up the global leaderboard!

•COMMUNICATION IS KEY: Even the most skilled Trainers recognize how important communication is to their team’s success. Leverage signals, quick-chat messages, and—for the first time in a Pokémon title—voice chat to communicate and stay in sync with your team.

•CROSS-PLATFORM PLAY: Play with Trainers around the world on the Nintendo Switch system or on a compatible smartphone thanks to cross-platform support. Trainers may use their Pokémon Trainer Club account or Nintendo Account on both Nintendo Switch and mobile to easily keep their progress synced between devices.

This game supports Brazilian Portuguese.
70010000043293.intro: Team up and take down the opposition in Pokémon’s first 5-on-5 strategic team battle game!
70010000043293.name: Pokémon UNITE

70010000046406.description:
In the newest game in the Kirby series, you'll venture into an unknown new world where civilisation and nature have become one. Use Kirby's familiar actions - inhale, spit out, jump and copy - to move freely around as you delve deep into 3D stages.

◆ Aim to save the Waddle Dees
You'll set out on your adventure with an important mission: to save the Waddle Dees that have been captured by mysterious enemies called the Beast Pack. In each stage, you'll need to fight members of the Beast Pack and solve challenges as you work to reach the goal and save the captured Waddle Dees.

◆ Try out the new Drill and Ranger Copy Abilities
In addition to experiencing your favourite Copy Abilities from the series in glorious 3D, there are also new abilities at your disposal. Drill lets you burrow underground, while Ranger lets you fire shooting-star shots!

◆ Work together in 2-player co-op as Kirby and Bandana Waddle Dee
You can share a Joy-Con to explore the new world as a team!
70010000046406.name: Kirby and the Forgotten Land

70010000063715.description:
Embark on a perilous quest to find the missing princess and unravel the truth behind a cataclysmic event that has sent the kingdom into turmoil.

You’ll decide your own path through the sprawling landscapes of Hyrule and the mysterious islands floating in the vast skies above.
70010000063715.intro: Explore the vast land – and skies – of Hyrule
70010000063715.name: The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom

70010000084609.description:
Get ready for the biggest party yet in Super Mario Party Jamboree. From running through merry-go-rounds to motion-control minigolf, this jamboree is jam-packed with over 110 minigames – the most of any Mario Party game to date!

This game supports Brazilian Portuguese.
70010000084609.intro: Join the latest Mario Party for a jamboree of seven boards and over 110 minigames!
70010000084609.name: Super Mario Party Jamboree

70010000084767.description:
The galaxy’s greatest bounty hunter Samus Aran will embark on a new mission in Metroid Prime 4: Beyond.

This game supports Brazilian Portuguese.

Screenshots taken from Nintendo Switch 2 version
70010000084767.name: Metroid Prime 4: Beyond

70010000094235.description:
If you purchase the digital version of Pokémon Legends: Z-A or Pokémon Legends: Z-A – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition by Saturday, February 28th, 2026, you’ll receive a serial code for a gift of 100 Poké Balls and a Ralts holding a Gardevoirite stone as an early-purchase bonus. 

You can receive Ralts by choosing Get via Internet in the Mystery Gift feature in your game until Saturday, February 28th, 2026.

An urban redevelopment plan is underway in Lumiose City! The goal: to turn it into a place Pokémon and people can truly share. Shortly after arriving, you’ll choose from one of these partner Pokémon to accompany you on your journey – Chikorita, Tepig or Totodile. 

Together, you can explore the streets of this vast city or visit Wild Zones – habitats where you’ll encounter wild Pokémon. To catch them, aim carefully and throw a Poké Ball or take them on with the help of the Pokémon on your team.
70010000094235.intro: An ambitious new adventure set within Lumiose City is coming in 2025.
70010000094235.name: Pokémon Legends: Z-A

70010000096818.description:
Explore an even more breathtaking Hyrule on Nintendo Switch 2. 

With higher resolution, improved frame rates, and HDR support, the expansive world of Hyrule has never looked better.

This game supports Brazilian Portuguese.
70010000096818.intro: Your epic adventure is now enhanced for Nintendo Switch 2
70010000096818.name: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition

70010000096822.description:
Explore the land, sky, and depths of Hyrule like never before on Nintendo Switch 2. 

With higher resolution, improved frame rates, and HDR support, the expansive world of Hyrule has never looked better.

This game supports Brazilian Portuguese.
70010000096822.intro: Your epic adventure is now enhanced for Nintendo Switch 2
70010000096822.name: The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition

70010000096826.description:
Jamboree TV is a new way to play that's all about audience participation! Take on a variety of challenges along with Mario and friends. Let the games begin!

This game supports Brazilian Portuguese.
70010000096826.intro: A super-charged celebration for Nintendo Switch 2
70010000096826.name: Super Mario Party Jamboree – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition + Jamboree TV

70010000096830.description:
Kirby and the Forgotten Land – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition + Star-Crossed World includes Kirby and the Forgotten Land, improved graphics and frame rate throughout, plus a new story: Star Crossed World.

After the world is struck by a powerful meteor, Kirby must use his amazing abilities, including some all-new Mouthful Modes to clear a trail through uncharted territory in this exciting adventure.
70010000096830.intro: Kirby's adventure continues on Nintendo Switch 2!
70010000096830.name: Kirby and the Forgotten Land – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition + Star-Crossed World

70010000099366.description:
If you purchase the digital version of Pokémon Legends: Z-A or Pokémon Legends: Z-A – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition by Saturday, February 28th, 2026, you’ll receive a serial code for a gift of 100 Poké Balls and a Ralts holding a Gardevoirite stone as an early-purchase bonus. 

You can receive Ralts by choosing Get via Internet in the Mystery Gift feature in your game until Saturday, February 28th, 2026.

An urban redevelopment plan is underway in Lumiose City! The goal: to turn it into a place Pokémon and people can truly share. Shortly after arriving, you’ll choose from one of these partner Pokémon to accompany you on your journey – Chikorita, Tepig or Totodile. 

Together, you can explore the streets of this vast city or visit Wild Zones – habitats where you’ll encounter wild Pokémon. To catch them, aim carefully and throw a Poké Ball or take them on with the help of the Pokémon on your team.
70010000099366.intro: Explore Lumiose City on Nintendo Switch 2
70010000099366.name: Pokémon Legends: Z-A – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition

70010000102053.description: Unwind with puzzles in Pokémon Friends! Solve sets of three randomly selected puzzles to help untangle your mind – then place the yarn you obtain into the Plush-O-Matic, a special machine that creates in-game Pokémon plush! As you try to make them all, you can track your crafted plush in the catalogue. You can also mark your calendar with a stamp each day you play.
70010000102053.intro: Cosy up with a variety of bite-sized puzzles – and collect virtual Pokémon plush!
70010000102053.name: Pokémon Friends

70010000104188.description:
Blast off for a gravity-defying experience in Super Mario Galaxy! Explore planets, recover the Grand Stars and travel the universe in the Comet Observatory on a quest to stop Bowser from creating his very own galaxy.

This game supports Brazilian Portuguese.
70010000104188.name: Super Mario Galaxy

70010000104193.description:
Enter a new universe of adventure beyond the stars in Super Mario Galaxy 2! Climb aboard Starship Mario and set out to discover more galaxies, more abilities and even more gravity-defying fun.

This game supports Brazilian Portuguese.
70010000104193.intro: Blast back into space with Mario and Yoshi!
70010000104193.name: Super Mario Galaxy 2

70010000104850.description:
The galaxy’s greatest bounty hunter Samus Aran will embark on a new mission in Metroid Prime 4: Beyond.

This game supports Brazilian Portuguese.
70010000104850.name: Metroid Prime 4: Beyond – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition

70030000015787.name: Kirby and the Forgotten Land Demo

70050000000122.description:
The Master Trials includes the following content:

Trial of the Sword
In the Trial of the Sword, you start with no weapons or equipment and must fight your way through 45 rooms of fierce enemies. Your only tools will be those you gather along the way. But the reward for completing such a gruelling challenge is great: finishing the trial will make the Master Sword even more powerful.

Hero's Path Mode
A map update that allows you to see the path you've travelled. About 200 hours of gameplay can be tracked on the map this way. When watching your path unfold, you can adjust the replay speed to trace your past movements faster or slower. This mode may help you find shrines you've missed by showing the areas you've yet to explore.

Master Mode
Master Mode increases the level of all monsters. For example, red Bokoblins will become blue Bokoblins, and you'll encounter powerful new enemies that don't appear in Normal Mode. Monsters will also slowly recover health and will be able to detect you more easily. You may even see enemies and treasure chests appear in mid-air.

Travel Medallion
An item, found in a hidden treasure chest, that allows you to register your current location as a travel gate on the map. You can only register one travel gate at a time.

8 hidden items for you to find
The following items, which pay tribute to The Legend of Zelda series, can now be found in treasure chests scattered across Hyrule: Majora's Mask, Midna's Helmet, Tingle's Hood, Tingle's Shirt, Tingle's Tights, Phantom Helmet, Phantom Armor and Phantom Greaves. Can you follow the hints and find them all?

Korok Mask
The Korok Mask is found in a new, hidden treasure chest. If equipped, the mask will shake to inform you when a Korok is nearby.
70050000000122.name: The Master Trials - DLC Pack 1

70050000000186.description:
The Champions' Ballad includes the following content:

The Champions' Ballad
Following the guidance of an unseen voice, Link encounters a new test: the Divine Beast Tamer's Trial. Take hold of the One-Hit Obliterator to clear out monster encampments, discover new shrines, conquer a huge dungeon and more. Overcoming all these obstacles will earn you the power to call upon the Master Cycle Zero.

Additionally, help the travelling bard Kass complete an unfinished song left behind by his mentor. Better still, Kass is also inspired to write some verses of his own, revealing scenes from the Champions' and Princess Zelda's past that even Link never knew of. And what exactly could Kass's mentor's song be...?

Note: To play The Champions' Ballad content, you must first complete the four main challenges to free the four Divine Beasts.

9 hidden items for you to find
The following items, which pay tribute to The Legend of Zelda series, can now be found scattered across Hyrule: Island Lobster Shirt, Ravio's Hood, Zant's Helmet, Phantom Ganon Skull, Phantom Ganon Armor and Phantom Ganon Greaves. You can also find the Royal Guard Cap, Royal Guard Uniform and Royal Guard Boots, which were once worn by Hyrule's royal guards.

Ancient Horse Gear
The Ancient Bridle, which increases the spurs available when riding the equipped horse, and the Ancient Saddle, which lets you summon the equipped horse wherever it is, are hidden in treasure chests somewhere in Hyrule, waiting to be found.
70050000000186.name: The Champions' Ballad - DLC Pack 2

70050000019994.description:
On top of the Nook Inc. Silk Rug that is available as an exclusive item from Nook Shopping, Nintendo Switch Online members will also be able to order a Nintendo Switch Lite as an in-game item after the latest update. It comes in four different colours, so pick your favourite when it pops up in Nook Shopping to order!
Notes:
- You need to have progressed far enough through the game in order to use miles at the Nook Stop.
- Even if other players on the island do not have Nintendo Switch Online memberships, they can still trade for the item. If other players cannot trade, please get the player with the reward to start the game and try again.
70050000019994.name: Exclusive items for Nintendo Switch Online members

70050000030743.description: Get creative and help design dream vacation homes for many of your favourite island residents in Animal Crossing: New Horizons – Happy Home Paradise, available as paid downloadable content for Animal Crossing: New Horizons.
70050000030743.name: Animal Crossing: New Horizons – Happy Home Paradise

70050000036095.description:
The inspiration behind it all returns to its 2D action roots! Castlevania’s unforgettable characters & gothic setting meet the fast-paced combat of the award-winning roguelite Dead Cells in this unprecedented collaboration.

A gateway to a striking castle has suddenly appeared, and an imposing warrior called Richter asks you to help him vanquish the great evil within. 

Enticed by the promise of new loot rather than a sense of moral duty, you strike out through the grounds and corridors of the gothic castle to find and kill this mysterious Dracula...

Slay hordes of his supernatural minions as you progress through our biggest DLC yet, including two levels, three bosses and a new storyline!

WIELD CLASSIC CASTLEVANIA WEAPONS 
Unlock 14 iconic weapons such as the Vampire Killer, Throwing Axe & Holy Water to decimate Dracula's bestiary of monsters and finally the dark lord himself. Each item has been translated into the fast-paced combat of Dead Cells while keeping their original essence. 

EXPLORE EVERY CORNER OF DRACULA'S CASTLE 
Secret rooms. Flame-lit corridors. Gloomy tombs. Beautiful paintings. Food hidden in the walls. Full of original monsters from the series, such as harpies, werewolves & haunted armors, the character of the iconic castle will transport you into the realms of gothic fantasy.

ENJOY CLASSIC & REIMAGINED MUSIC 
We're giving you access to an alternative soundtrack made of 51 of the original Castlevania tunes, that can be heard across the entire game. Yes, 51! 
On top of this, we've taken the 12  most iconic tracks, such as Vampire Killer, Bloody Tears and Simon Belmont's Theme, and reimagined them in the style of Dead Cells as a soundtrack for this DLC, while preserving the Castlevania ambiance of course.

DISCOVER A NEW STORYLINE 
Richter Belmont and Alucard will be by your side throughout your quest to vanquish Dracula, helping you to navigate the maze of Dracula’s Castle  and providing you with strong weapons (sometimes willingly, sometimes not). However, where there is good there is evil, so watch out for powerful foes who will try everything in their power to stop you from reaching the throne room.

MASTER THREE EPIC BOSS FIGHTS 
Fight against the very essence of evil in two intense duels versus Death and Dracula, both set against a majestic backdrop. If you can survive these gauntlets, prepare yourself for our most ambitious boss showdown yet...

UNLOCK CASTLEVANIA CHARACTER OUTFITS 
Unlock 20 outfits as you progress through the castle, letting you roleplay as all your favourite characters like Alucard, Richter Belmont, Simon Belmont, Maria Renard, Trevor Belmont, Sypha Belnades or even Dracula himself.
70050000036095.intro: Wield classic Castlevania weapons on a quest through Dracula’s Castle.
70050000036095.name: Dead Cells: Return to Castlevania

70050000047065.description:
Enjoy four game modes: "Original," "Time Limit," "Attack," and "Item."

"Original" is the usual Suika Game, and the player with the highest score wins. Once the box is full, play ends at that point. If the other side's score is higher, you win at that point. If you are losing, continue playing. Can you catch up to your opponent?!

"Time Limit" is a 5-minute intense competition, and the player with the highest score wins. When the rainbow gauge runs out, Poppy will drop fruits on her own, so you'll need to make decisions faster than usual!

In "Attack," the winner is the one who ends the opponent's game. On every 5th attempt, you can send an evolved fruit to your opponent's box. Sending a big fruit could turn the tables!

In "Item," the player with the higher score wins. Evolve fruits to get items, and use them strategically to gain an advantage. Timing your item use well could be the key to victory!
70050000047065.intro: A brand new two-player addition to the Suika Game is here; come and join the fun!
70050000047065.name: Suika Game Multi-Player Mode Expansion Pack-Offline

70050000047502.description:
Enjoy four game modes: "Original," "Time Limit," "Attack," and "Item."

"Original" is the usual Suika Game, and the player with the highest score wins. Once the box is full, play ends at that point. If the other side's score is higher, you win at that point. If you are losing, continue playing. Can you catch up to your opponent?!

"Time Limit" is a 5-minute intense competition, and the player with the highest score wins. When the rainbow gauge runs out, Poppy will drop fruits on her own, so you'll need to make decisions faster than usual!

In "Attack," the winner is the one who ends the opponent's game. On every 5th attempt, you can send an evolved fruit to your opponent's box. Sending a big fruit could turn the tables!

In "Item," the player with the higher score wins. Evolve fruits to get items, and use them strategically to gain an advantage. Timing your item use well could be the key to victory!

※ Online play mode requires a subscription to "Nintendo Switch Online" (paid).
70050000047502.intro: A brand new two-player addition to the Suika Game is here, come and join the fun!
70050000047502.name: Suika Game Multi-Player Mode Expansion Pack-Online

Kirby and the Forgotten Land – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition + Star-Crossed World includes Kirby and the Forgotten Land, improved graphics and frame rate throughout, plus a new story: Star Crossed World.

After the world is struck by a powerful meteor, Kirby must use his amazing abilities, including some all-new Mouthful Modes to clear a trail through uncharted territory in this exciting adventure.

Kirby and the Forgotten Land for Nintendo Switch required to use this upgrade pack, sold separately.

70070000030078.description:
"Prototype Arsenal"*
"Prototype Suit"*
"Camouflage Plugsuit" Outer Plugsuit (Male/Female)
"Formal Attire" Outer Plugsuit (Male/Female)
"Crusader" Arsenal
"Muramasa" Arsenal
"Rabbit 11" Arsenal
Arsenal Decals Set
Outer Emotes (Male/Female) Set
Arsenal Patterns Set

You must own DAEMON X MACHINA on Nintendo Switch to access downloadable content.

These items can be used to change the exterior and appearance of the Arsenal and Outer Suit, and do not affect gameplay.

The items included in this set can also be purchased individually. Please be careful not to purchase duplicate content.

*These items are the same as the early purchase bonus content, "Prototype Arsenal" and "Prototype Suit". If you have already downloaded this bonus content, please be careful not to purchase duplicate content.
70070000030078.intro: A bundle that includes multiple sets and DLC content released for DAEMON X MACHINA.
70070000030078.name: DLC Bundle 1

"Man Bun" Outer part (Male/Female)

You must own DAEMON X MACHINA on Nintendo Switch to access downloadable content.

These items can be used to change your character's appearance and do not affect gameplay.

The items included in this set can also be purchased individually. Please be careful not to purchase duplicate content.
70070000030090.intro: A bundle that includes multiple sets and DLC content released for DAEMON X MACHINA.
70070000030090.name: DLC Bundle 2

70070000030726.description:
Embark on an enhanced pair of interstellar escapades in Super Mario Galaxy + Super Mario Galaxy 2! Journey into space on the hunt for Power Stars, overcome a universe of challenges and most of all – stop Bowser!

This game supports Brazilian Portuguese.
70070000030726.intro: Blast off in two classic cosmic adventures!
70070000030726.name: Super Mario Galaxy + Super Mario Galaxy 2

70070000030754.description:
If you purchase Pokémon Legends: Z-A – Mega Dimension by February 28th 2026, you’ll receive a serial code for a Luxurious Poké Ball Set. This item set includes 12 Poké Balls in four different varieties – featuring three of each variety – that are especially effective at catching certain kinds of Pokémon.

The Mega Dimension DLC includes the following content:

Wave 1: Holo-X and Holo-Y Apparel Sets – available October 16th, 2025

Wave 2: Additional story content – planned for release by February 28th, 2026

An additional story that can be enjoyed after completing the main story of Pokémon Legends: Z-A.
70070000030754.intro: Continue your adventures in Pokémon Legends: Z-A with the Mega Dimension paid DLC!
70070000030754.name: Pokémon Legends: Z-A – Mega Dimension DLC
